title: Directs the director of the state office for the aging to establish mature worker training programs and awards grants to providers thereof
summary: Directs the director of the state office for the aging to establish mature worker training programs for persons 55 or older who are seeking training to enable them to remain in or re-enter the work force; and provides for the awarding of grants to the providers of such programs.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to establishing the mature worker employment training program
